info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:16AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Van Buren, west central Cleburne and northeastern Conway Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 816 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Whipple... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Austin in Conway County... Edgemont... Culpepper... Formosa... South Fork Recreation Area... Botkinburg... Crabtree... Choctow Recreation Area... Narrows Marina... Scotland... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
